org.cell2d.space.basic

Class BasicSpaceState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cell2d.Thinker<T,U,V>
      • org.cell2d.GameState<T,U,V>
        • org.cell2d.space.SpaceState<CellGame,BasicSpaceState,BasicSpaceThinker>
          • org.cell2d.space.basic.BasicSpaceState

  • public class BasicSpaceState
extends SpaceState<CellGame,BasicSpaceState,BasicSpaceThinker>

    A BasicSpaceState is a type of SpaceState that uses BasicSpaceThinkers, which have no special capabilities, and treats its CellGame as a basic CellGame. It is designed to be easily extended by types of SpaceStates that do not require custom fields or methods to be automatically shared between themselves and their SpaceThinkers or CellGames.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicSpaceState

        public BasicSpaceState(CellGame game,
                       int id,
                       long cellWidth,
                       long cellHeight,
                       SpaceState.DrawMode drawMode)
        Constructs a BasicSpaceState of the specified CellGame with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        game - The CellGame to which this BasicSpaceState belongs
        id - This BasicSpaceState's ID
        cellWidth - The width of each of this BasicSpaceState's cells
        cellHeight - The height of each of this BasicSpaceState's cells
        drawMode - This BasicSpaceState's DrawMode
